thread.title: Arjun Rampal is left disoriented after suffering an eye injury – view pic
thread.title_full: Arjun Rampal is left disoriented after suffering an eye injury – view pic

author: Karan Shah
title: Arjun Rampal is left disoriented after suffering an eye injury – view pic
text:
Rock On!! 2 First Look Photos 
Arjun Rampal suffered a shocking eye injury recently and looks like he has been left disoriented by it. However, there is no need to worry as it is not that serious and he will be fine pretty soon! The actor posted about his latest injury on Instagram with a picture and a caption, which read as, “Now I know how a one-eyed pirate sees the world. A minor eye injury. Nothing as serious as it looks. Hugely disorienting. See you soon.” 
In the image you can clearly see him with a bandage on one eye and a stubble on his face. However, there is nothing to worry as the actor is no stranger to injuries. He has injured himself quite a bit over thea past few years, most recently during Kahaani 2 . He had busted his knee during a chase sequence while shooting for the film and had to take bed rest for a few days too. And now, it looks like he has injured his eye. Check out his post right   his latest injury   ALSO READ – Shraddha Kapoor and Farhan Akhtar go on a double date with Arjun Rampal and his wife Mehr Jesia A photo posted by Arjun (@rampal72) on Jan 3, 2017 at 4:22am   Arjun’s last two releases – Rock On 2 and Kahaani 2 failed to perform well at the box office. While he was praised for his part in both the movies, the lack of a good storyline lead to both of them failing at the box office. He will now be seen in Daddy , which is based on the life of gangster-turned-politician Arun Gawli. He plays the lead protagonist in the movie, which also features his Rock On 2 co-star Farhan Akhtar as Dawood Ibrahim. Anyway, we wish Arjun Rampal a speedy recovery and we hope to see him in a few more films in 2017! A LSO READ – 5 spine chilling scenes from Vidya Balan-Arjun Rampal’s Kahaani 2 
(With inputs from IANS) Published: January 4, 2017 3:06 am Topics:
